Description: Fragment of handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay medium, light brown; mainly white inclusions; cream slip. Circular stamp with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie noted several such stamps in his 1884-5 diary (EES Archive XVII 47) Parallels: as before. Name Ion.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1329)
